meanings.definition: A protein that forms the contractile filaments of muscle cells.
meanings.sent2: The myosin in muscle cells allows movement.
meanings.sent3: The myosin protein decided to flex its muscles and show off.
meanings.sent4: The myosin fibers pulled the muscle together like a team of tiny workers.
meanings.sent5: Picture myosin as the tiny machines that make your muscles work.

meanings.definition: A motor protein that interacts with actin to produce movement in cells.
meanings.sent2: Myosin and actin work together for cell movement.
meanings.sent3: The myosin protein in cells loves to dance with actin.
meanings.sent4: Myosin is like the engine that drives cell movement forward.
meanings.sent5: Imagine myosin as the busy worker in a cell factory, always on the go.
